description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: The "German Derby" at Hamburg; Mr Dean Rusk, American Secretary of State, visits Bonn; the annual Berlin Film Festival - young filmmakers win awards; the famous Baedeker travel guides still printed in Freiburg; the "Documenta" International Art Exhibition in Cassel; the 86th Kiel Regatta on the Baltic Coast - the venue for the yachting events at the 1972 Olympic Games.
